name: Multi State Dungeon Map
author: TheRock
info: Ever annoyed that with your 2 state dungeon when you go to one version the other one looks like you haven't been anywhere? Well I have, so here's the fix so now it will appear as if both states on the same map.
description: This script makes so the screens you visit on one map will look like you have been there on a different map. Very useful for multistate dungeons with the space bar map.
setup: const int mapOne = 1; //Map number of the first state of the dungeonconst int mapTwo = 2; //Map number of the second state of the dungeon
